categories: Category:Battles of the Krath Holy Crusade during the Great Sith War

nodes.text: Battle of the Churba system  (Great Sith War)

A battle of the Great Sith War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, was fought in 3996 BBY. At the Churba system, the two sides fought with the Republic emerging as the victors.

The battle is only referenced once in The Essential Atlas. It is marked on a galactic map showing the course of the Great Sith War rather than described in prose. In the Atlas, the Churba system is denoted as the "New Cov system" after the planet of New Cov, which it contains.
